issue.message: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to query or interact with MediaStore or media files on the shared storage, you should instead use one or more new storage permissions: `READ_MEDIA_IMAGES`, `READ_MEDIA_VIDEO` or `READ_MEDIA_AUDIO`.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to write to shared storage, use the `MediaStore.createWriteRequest` intent.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to write to shared storage, use the `MediaStore.createWriteRequest` intent.

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to query or interact with MediaStore or media files on the shared storage, you should instead use one or more new storage permissions: `READ_MEDIA_IMAGES`, `READ_MEDIA_VIDEO` or `READ_MEDIA_AUDIO`.
This transaction should be completed with a `commit()` call
Consider using `apply()` instead; `commit` writes its data to persistent storage immediately, whereas `apply` will handle it in the background
Consider using `apply()` instead; `commit` writes its data to persistent storage immediately, whereas `apply` will handle it in the background
Consider using `apply()` instead; `commit` writes its data to persistent storage immediately, whereas `apply` will handle it in the background

issue.errorLine1: <string name="notification_erase_text_android_14" moz:RemovedIn="124" tools:ignore="UnusedResources">Podótkńće so tuteje zdźělenki abo zhašejće ju, zo byšće swoju přehladowansku historiju wěsće zhašał.</string>

issue.errorLine1: <string name="notification_erase_text_android_14" moz:RemovedIn="124" tools:ignore="UnusedResources">Që të fshihet në mënyrë të siguruar historiku juaj i shfletimit, prekeni, ose spastrojeni këtë njoftim.</string>

issue.errorLine1: <string name="notification_erase_text_android_14" moz:RemovedIn="124" tools:ignore="UnusedResources">Tik op deze notificatie of sluit hem om uw navigatiegeschiedenis veilig te wissen.</string>

issue.message: "notification_erase_text_android_14" is translated here but not found in default locale
issue.errorLine1: <string name="notification_erase_text_android_14" moz:RemovedIn="124" tools:ignore="UnusedResources">ਤੁਹਾਡੇ ਬਰਾਊਜ਼ ਕਰਨ ਦੇ ਅਤੀਤ ਨੂੰ ਸੁਰੱਖਿਅਤ ਢੰਗ ਨਾਲ ਮਿਟਾਉਣ ਲਈ ਇਸ ਨੋਟੀਫਿਕੇਸ਼ਨ ਨੂੰ ਛੂਹੋ ਜਾਂ ਸਾਫ਼ ਕਰੋ।</string>

issue.errorLine1: <string name="notification_erase_text_android_14" moz:RemovedIn="124" tools:ignore="UnusedResources">የአሰሳ ታሪክዎን ደህንነቱ በተጠበቀ መልኩ ለማጥፋት ይህን ማሳወቂያ መታ ያድርጉ ወይም ያጽዱ።</string>

issue.message: The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.
It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.
